title: How can I tell whether the phone is connecting to the Internet via mobile data (SIM/UIM card) or Wi-Fi
answer:
Look at the status bar on the top of the screen to determine the connection status. 

If you can see the Wi-Fi icon (![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123151)), the phone is connected to the Internet via Wi-Fi. If you can see ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123152), the phone is connected to the Internet via a mobile data connection.
keywords: mobile Internet, Wi-Fi connection, WLAN, wireless connection, mobile data
